bibl.title: Coptic Society, Literature and Religion from Late Antiquity to Modern Times. Proceedings of the Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012 and Plenary Reports of the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. I; - II
bibl.note: nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., pll.

I, pp. xvii-xx: P.B., A.C. & Tito Orlandi, Introduction. - Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. - Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012: Part I. Plenary Reports; - Part II. Panels (Bawit. A Monastic Community, its Structures and its Texts [introduction by Gesa Schenke]; - Thebes in Late Antiquity [introduction by Malcolm Choat & Jennifer Cromwell]; - The Reconstruction and Edition of Coptic Biblical Manuscripts [introduction by Frank Feder]. - Part III. Papers from the Theme Sections (Literature; - Hagiography; - Gnostic Literature and Magical Texts; - Liturgy; - Documentary Papyrology; - Linguistics; - Archeology; - Art).
bibl.seg: Paola Buzi, Alberto Camplani & Federico Contardi (edd.), Coptic Society, Literature and Religion from Late Antiquity to Modern Times. Proceedings of the Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012 and Plenary Reports of the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. I; - II = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 247.
Leuven - Paris - Bristol, CT, Peeters, 2016, 8Â°, xx-pp. 1-886; - xiv-pp. 887-1655, nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., pll. ISBN 978-90-429-3273-9. $280.

I, pp. xvii-xx: P.B., A.C. & Tito Orlandi, Introduction. - Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. - Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012: Part I. Plenary Reports; - Part II. Panels (Bawit. A Monastic Community, its Structures and its Texts [introduction by Gesa Schenke]; - Thebes in Late Antiquity [introduction by Malcolm Choat & Jennifer Cromwell]; - The Reconstruction and Edition of Coptic Biblical Manuscripts [introduction by Frank Feder]. - Part III. Papers from the Theme Sections (Literature; - Hagiography; - Gnostic Literature and Magical Texts; - Liturgy; - Documentary Papyrology; - Linguistics; - Archeology; - Art).
Buzi Camplani Contardi Orlandi Schenke Choat Cromwell Feder
